Reviews.Title: “Ok for one night if you dont want to park!”
Reviews.Author: KimQueenofQuo
Reviews.Content: reading reviews various websites tried cancel minute couldn’t arrived car park road 2 hour free parking customers entered pub people watching football guy bar manager key 2 3 times parking bit whispering park street pub looked recently decorated carpet bed – metal creaky metal ikea type looked bedding ok curtains thin road lights etc shone night sink sign share toilet corridor clean plenty loo roll soap etc bathroom idea gone 6am parking pub doesn’t 12 noon leave key means can’t lock goes missing corridor ceiling covered breakfast – 2 boxes cornflakes uht skimmed milk orange juice fridge worktop size fridge tv balanced didn’t try couple towels supplied kettle tea coffee sugar pub closed ie 12 noon 11pm enter hotel via 4 flights fire exit dark rain challenge don’t climbing steps don’t heights isn’t park don’t bother booking night’s sleep don’t book you’re bothered hours survive

Reviews.Title: “If you get what you pay for, this place should be much cheaper.”
Reviews.Author: mundaetraversa
Reviews.Content: live uk wife traveled friends check traditional stuff ben etc favorite world backpackers travel cheaply expectations appalled accomodation unfortunately worst bed squeaked horribly help feel rested days walking city television ancient tiny nonfunctional anyway carpet filthy inroom sink nasty dishes tea cereal gross didnt feel sanitary eat saving money morning food bathroom floor appear pictures online makes wish post stayed lots hostels lots countries disgusting bathroom cleaner toilets desert road alexandria cairo seriously didnt mind fire escape entrance pub downstairs liked pub actually watched bunch football drunk forget wed pee sleep junction location okay enjoyed walk tube morning shopping center street pub helpful hostel experience outside city center understand amenities mismatched furniture accept lack basic sanitation moldy sink unclean dishes shower truly worst travel experiences life choose hostel getting sick grossed
